name: Arlong

trigger.text: Rest up to 1 of your opponent's cost 4 or lower characters.

text: On Play: You may discard 1 card from your hand: up to 1 of your opponent's rested leaders may not attack until the end of their next turn. Trigger: Rest up to 1 of your opponent's cost 4 or lower characters.
